text.title: Hello, I'm Yassine.
parag: Experienced self-taught developer with over <bold>5+ years</bold> of crafting advanced SaaS products and B2B solutions, specializing in transforming imaginative designs into robust, scalable web solutions that set new standards.
I love building tools that are <bold>user friendly, simple</bold> and <bold>delightful</bold>.

Through these experiences, I had the opportunity to work with both small and large companies, as well as specialized and cross-functional teams across different time zones & developed a working style that prioritizes <bold>flexibility, clarity</bold> and <bold>collaboration</bold>.
I'm currently looking for a new role as a developer. <link href="mailto:yassinechmarekh88@gmail.com">Hire me?</link>

items.title: Freelance Experience ‚Äì E-commerce Website Development
items.subTitle: Full Stack Developer
details: Developed a complete e-commerce website, including product management, user authentication, and secure payment integration.
Designed a responsive and modern user interface ensuring smooth navigation and a high-quality user experience.
Implemented a Laravel-based backend and optimized database queries for better performance.
Collaborated with the client to define requirements, propose features, and deliver the final product on schedule.

items.title: MT Informatique ‚Äì Final Year Internship Project
items.subTitle: Full Stack Developer
details: Developed a web application as part of the final academic project, using Laravel and modern front-end technologies.
Integrated APIs and optimized database structures for efficient data handling.
Contributed to both front-end and back-end development, ensuring functionality and scalability.
Documented the project and presented it successfully to the academic jury.
